author: VasilievSerg
body:
Developers of PVS-Studio C/C++/C# static analyzer present their check report of the source code of 'PowerShell' in the article, containing the review of the most suspicious code fragments they discovered.

You can read article at the official site:
http://www.viva64.com/en/b/0447/

I have provided links to GitHub for each code fragment to make viewing more comfortable. Nevertheless, a lot of fragments, detected by the analyzer weren't given in the article. That's why I would suggest trying out the analyzer and viewing other warnings besides fixing the given code fragments.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @VasilievSerg  Could you publish here the entire report?

comments.author: VasilievSerg

title: Analysis of 'PowerShell' source code by PVS-Studio static code analyzer
